item.title: Data from Ontogenetic thermal tolerance and performance of ectotherms at variable temperatures
item.description: Sources Background Summary of Re-analysis Reproducibility Post-publication review Reproducibility Table 1 Table 2 Table 3 Figure 2 Post-publication review Use the full model to compare to Huey & Kinsolver Table of contrasts needed for interpretation Harrell Plots of full model ignoring sex Summary of my Harrell Plots and Table of contrasts Shift in UTL Red Flags Statistical misconceptions Sources Cavieres G, Bogdanovich JM, Bozinovic F (2016) Ontogenetic thermal tolerance and performance of ectotherms at variable temperatures.

item.title: Data from: Success despite the stress -- violet-green swallows increase glucocorticoids and maintain reproductive output despite experimental increases in flight costs
item.description: Sources Rivers JW, Newberry GN, Schwarz CJ, Ardia DR (2017) Success despite the stress: violet-green swallows increase glucocorticoids and maintain reproductive output despite experimental increases in flight costs. Functional Ecology 31(1): 235-244. https://doi.org/10.1111/1365-2435.12719 [Google Scholar]c] Data source: https://datadryad.org/resource/doi:10.5061/dryad.3bc3s Background usage note The authors refer to the measure of cortisol as “baseline cortisol.” Sice the design here is pre-post, this could be confused with the more general and wide usage of “baseline” to mean pre-treatment measure.

item.title: Data from: Density triggers maternal hormones that increase adaptive offspring growth in a wild mammal
item.description: Sources Background Reproducibility Effect of spruce cone availability on local density (Fig. 1B) Effect of Density on growth rate (Fig. 2/Table S2) Effect of Density on fecal cortisol metabolites (Fig. 3/Table S4) Effect of FCM on offspring growth rate (Table S5) Effect of experiment Cortisol on growth rate (Table S6) Red flags Effect of Density on growth rate (Fig. 2/Table S2) Growth rate is a change score and is confounding by the basline Figure 2 doesn’t make sense Effect of Density on fecal cortisol metabolites (Fig.
